net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.util

Class ConfigPropertiesAugmenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.util.ConfigPropertiesAugmenter

  • public class ConfigPropertiesAugmenter
extends Object
    Utility class which can be used to merge several configuration sources. It merges the properties from a base Properties object with another one. Mappings, children of composites and other properties are extended rather than overwritten, so that an existing bundle from the source can get additional mappings.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigPropertiesAugmenter(Properties configProperties)
      Constructor
      ConfigPropertiesAugmenter(Properties configProperties, Set<String> privateConfigProperties)
      Creates an instance of the augmenter which uses configProperties as the base configuration to augment, but prevents the overwriting of any property stated in the privateConfigProperties list.

    • Method Summary

      void augmentConfiguration(Properties configToAdd)
      Augments the base configuration with the properties specified as parameter.
      protected boolean isAugmentable(String configKey)
      Determine wether a property is augmentable (so instead of overriding, values are appended to the current values).

        protected boolean isAugmentable(String configKey)
        Determine wether a property is augmentable (so instead of overriding, values are appended to the current values).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the property is augmentable or not.
